long_description: With a reliable 20-speed Shimano 105 drivetrain and a smooth carbon fork, the Diamondback Century 2 Bike offers agility and speed with a very comfortable riding position for long days in the saddle. Butted aluminum frame features a relaxed geometry that won't punish your back and neck during long rides, and the full carbon fork with alloy steerer damps road vibration. Shimano 105 drivetrain offers responsive, snappy shifting throughout the 20 gear combinations. FSA Omega Compact crankset with 50/34 chainrings is paired with a 12-30 cassette for a wide range of gearing for easy climbs and speed on the flats. DB Equation R wheels are equipped with Michelin Dynamic Sport tires to supply good all-around performance. Please note that this bike includes composite test pedals; additional pedals sold separately. Specs on the Diamondback Century 2 Bike are subject to change.
